channel.title: The Final Girls / @TheFinalGirlsUK
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @TheFinalGirlsUK. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @TheFinalGirlsUK: @TheFinalGirlsUK podcast hosted by @annabdemented takes a look at various horror subgenres and themes from a feminist perspective. A great choice and variety of themes, films and guests make this a must listen for horror film fans.
item.dc:creator: @Nobodyknowsnose
item.description: @TheFinalGirlsUK podcast hosted by @annabdemented takes a look at various horror subgenres and themes from a feminist perspective. A great choice and variety of themes, films and guests make this a must listen for horror film fans.

item.title: RT by @TheFinalGirlsUK: Excellent hour-long interview with Alex Garland on @TheFinalGirlsUK website about 'Men'. I disagree with lots of what he says, & I'm still baffled by the film, but his honest attempts to be articulate about it are admirable & worth listening to.
item.dc:creator: @bensonpeter20
item.description: Excellent hour-long interview with Alex Garland on @TheFinalGirlsUK website about 'Men'. I disagree with lots of what he says, & I'm still baffled by the film, but his honest attempts to be articulate about it are admirable & worth listening to.

item.title: RT by @TheFinalGirlsUK: I’m thoroughly enjoying the @TheFinalGirlsUK #IT episode w/ @Shiny_Demon what a great young cast but a standout was little Georgie, @JacksonRScottIT his physicality and emoting was far beyond his years. #WeAllFloat

item.description: I’m thoroughly enjoying the @TheFinalGirlsUK #IT episode w/ @Shiny_Demon what a great young cast but a standout was little Georgie, @JacksonRScottIT his physicality and emoting was far beyond his years. #WeAllFloat

item.title: RT by @TheFinalGirlsUK: Listening to the newest ep of @TheFinalGirlsUK and feeling so DEEPLY VINDICATED at @annabdemented and @JorCru's love for NOW AND THEN, one of my most formative influences and a film deeply deserving of a blu-ray release for suuuure

item.title:
We cannot wait for this one!
Tickets are now on sale for @hannabergholm's eerie body-horror HATCHING. Screening SAT 11 JUNE as part of @sundancefest London 🎟
Hanna's short PUPPET MASTER screened as part of our We Are The Weirdos programme in 2019 🙌

item.title:
RT by @TheFinalGirlsUK: The tide of terror that swept America IS HERE.
This day in 1980: Stanley Kubrick's horror classic THE SHINING was released.
The film was featured on the cover of Fango Issue 7: https://www.fangoria.com/archives/the-shining-maniac/

item.title: RT by @TheFinalGirlsUK: Six years ago today @LiviHowe and I did our very first @TheFinalGirlsUK screening and made everyone really uncomfortable. Countless screenings, touring programmes, panels, zines, articles and podcast episodes later... still screening things that make people uncomfortable 💀
item.dc:creator: @annabdemented
item.description:
Six years ago today @LiviHowe and I did our very first @TheFinalGirlsUK screening and made everyone really uncomfortable. Countless screenings, touring programmes, panels, zines, articles and podcast episodes later... still screening things that make people uncomfortable 💀

item.title:
It's #FridayThe13th aka SIX years today since we launched @thefinalgirlsuk with our first event at @ThePCCLondon 🩸
Fittingly, that same 35MM print screens this month at @BFI Southbank as part of @annabdemented's New French Extremity season. Don't miss it!
item.dc:creator: @TheFinalGirlsUK
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @TheFinalGirlsUK: Happy birthday to horror legend Lisa Wilcox, known for her genre work in A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET 4: THE DREAM MASTER, 5: THE DREAM CHILD, THE QUIET ROOM short film, and so much more.
Would you like to see Wilcox face off against Freddy once more time?
item.dc:creator: @FANGORIA
item.description:
Happy birthday to horror legend Lisa Wilcox, known for her genre work in A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET 4: THE DREAM MASTER, 5: THE DREAM CHILD, THE QUIET ROOM short film, and so much more.

Would you like to see Wilcox face off against Freddy once more time?
